		QwtPlot3d 0.3.1a

	--------------------------------
	http://qwtplot3d.sourceforge.net



Version 0.3.1a - Sep 2014
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
- support for Qt 5.3 and MinGW
- Qt Creator projects fixed
- some issues of Plot3d fixed
- added Dynamicplot example


Version 0.3.1 - Jan-Feb 2014
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
- common performance optimizations (up to 50%)
- added VolumePlot implementation
- added volumeplot example
- support for Qt 4.8 and Qt 5.2



License notes
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
This distribution is mainly based on QwtPlot3d 0.3.0 revision 259
(http://sourceforge.net/p/qwtplot3d/code/HEAD/tree/)

Parts of the software are provided by Sintegrial Technologies (c) 2013-2014
(http://sintegrial.com)

Extensions made by Sintegrial Technologies are provided 'as-is', without
any warranty. They are granted under the terms of the original QwtPlot3D 
license.

Some examples are using data provided by Stanford 3D Scanning Repository
(https://graphics.stanford.edu/data/3Dscanrep)

See the original QwtPlot3D license file: license.txt
